content: this is a legal case being heard in the municipal court of vinkovci the case involves the termination of coownership of a real estate property the coowners involved are mg and ljh with mg owning 27 out of 30 shares and ljh owning 3 out of 30 shares the coownership was terminated through a payment made by mg resulting in mg becoming the sole owner of the property the court received a proposal from mg to terminate the coownership by paying ljh an equivalent share the court determined the value of each coownership share and decided to terminate the coownership community with mg being instructed to pay ljh the value of their share
